data.name: Evil Bird Simulator
data.detailed_description:
In this 2D side scrolling game you will play as your favorite bird as they crap on people and cars for points. This game is uniquely challenging because you will need to time your bird's bombs to hit the targets. Many of the people will try to attack you, and you must use your skills to dodge their attacks. If you die too many times, you will get a unique game over experience where you will go to hell! You will not be granted a simple game over, but instead you will have to earn your way back to the real world by playing through different levels of hell until you earn another chance in the normal game. This game is a test of your skill and critical decision making skills, you will need to know exactly when to flap and when to crap to get ahead in this game.

In this game you can:
- Crap on people and cars.
- Get attacked by crazy citizens.
- Crap on skeletons in hell.
- Collect powerups such as pizzas, burgers, & cookies.
- Unlock 10 unique levels which you can replay at any time.
- You can get stuck in a black hole in outer space.
- Your bird can have diarrhea if it eats too much food.
- There are at least 2 secret playable levels in the game which you can find and unlock.
- There is a secret dungeon somewhere in the game you can also stuck in.
- This game has some controller support.

data.short_description: Evil Bird Simulator is a weird pixel art game where you control an evil bird that craps on people and cars. Some of the people will try to attack you and you will go to hell if you get a game over. You will have to play your way through hell to get back to the normal game. Do you have what it takes?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 550 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: 3GHz
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
